title: CLI plugin: load name/description from installed plugin
body:
### Description

When I install a CLI plugin using Maven GAVs:

- The existence of the plugin is not checked, resulting in a runtime error when trying to use the plugin if it doesn't exist. We should fix this, and refuse to install non-existent plugins.
- The name and description of the plugin need to be specified from the command-line, instead of fetching them from the plugin by scanning it and fetching its main command annotation. This makes it really awkward to figure out, because it's counter-intuitive and results in a plugin name which is the artifact name instead of the command that is defined in the plugin, making it really hard to invoke later. We should fix this.
